basic.description:
A detailed study of plays by Corneille, Racine, Molière. Travaux pratiques include tests, an oral presentation and an in-depth essay. Given jointly with FREN 306/3.0.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Le théâtre classique

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites    FREN212 and FREN220 and Level 4 and registration in a FREN or FRLG Plan.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FREN306; FREN418.
